message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate the value of the product you're offering, but my budget is limited. I'm willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm confident this product will bring you significant value exceeding that price. How about we meet at $18,000?
Hello Alice, I've given your offer some thought, but unfortunately, I still can't meet at $18,000. I'm willing to go up to $16,000. Is there any way we could come to an agreement within my budget?
